verses.verse: מִקֵּ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz At the end שֶֽׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> she-va'- of [every] seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh thou shalt make שְׁמִטָּֽה׃ <S%H8059><s%> she-mit-Tah. a release

וְזֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh This דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var And this [is] the manner הַשְּׁמִטָּה֒ <S%H8059><s%> hash-she-mit-Tah of the release שָׁמ֗וֹט <S%H8058><s%> sha-Mot, shall release כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every בַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H1167><s%> ba-'al archer מַשֵּׁ֣ה <S%H4874><s%> mash-Sheh creditor יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do, able אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what יַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H5383><s%> yash-Sheh that lendeth בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> be-re-'E-hu; [ought] unto his neighbour לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יִגֹּ֤שׂ <S%H5065><s%> yig-Gos [it] he shall not exact אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu [it] of his neighbour וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv, or of his brother כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra because it is called שְׁמִטָּ֖ה <S%H8059><s%> she-mit-Tah release לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD'S

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנָּכְרִ֖י <S%H5237><s%> han-na-che-Ri Of a foreigner תִּגֹּ֑שׂ <S%H5065><s%> tig-Gos; thou mayest exact וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher whatever יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לְךָ֛ le-Cha אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- is with אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha [it again] but [that] which is thine with thy brother תַּשְׁמֵ֥ט <S%H8058><s%> tash-Met shall release יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha. thine hand

אֶ֕פֶס <S%H657><s%> 'E-fes Save כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki since לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo will be no יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become בְּךָ֖ be-Cha אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> ev-Yon; when there shall be no poor כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- since בָרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> va-Rech shall greatly יְבָֽרֶכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-rech-Cha bless יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, among you for the LORD בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz thee in the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹֽתֵן־ <S%H5414><s%> no-ten- giveth לְךָ֥ le-Cha נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah thee [for] an inheritance לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah. to possess

רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Mo-a' Only if thou carefully תִּשְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma', hearken בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor to observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-sOt to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah all these commandments הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. thee this day

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בֵּֽרַכְךָ֔ <S%H1288><s%> be-rach-Cha, blesseth כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- thee as he promised לָ֑ךְ Lach; וְהַֽעֲבַטְתָּ֞ <S%H5670><s%> ve-ha-'a-vat-Ta thee and thou shalt lend גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim nations רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, unto many וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo you will not תַעֲבֹ֔ט <S%H5670><s%> ta-'a-Vot, but thou shalt not borrow וּמָֽשַׁלְתָּ֙ <S%H4910><s%> u-ma-shal-Ta and thou shalt reign בְּגוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> be-go-Yim nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, over many וּבְךָ֖ u-ve-Cha לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo they will not יִמְשֹֽׁלוּ׃ <S%H4910><s%> yim-Sho-lu. but they shall not reign ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִהְיֶה֩ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become בְךָ֨ ve-Cha אֶבְי֜וֹן <S%H34><s%> ev-Yon If there be among you a poor man מֵאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> me-'a-Chad of one אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha of thy brethren בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'a-Chad within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Rei-cha, of thy gates בְּאַ֨רְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> be-'Ar-tze-cha, in thy land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָ֑ךְ Lach; לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תְאַמֵּ֣ץ <S%H553><s%> te-'am-Metz thee thou shalt not harden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לְבָבְךָ֗ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha, thine heart וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תִקְפֹּץ֙ <S%H7092><s%> tik-Potz nor shut אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָ֣דְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-cha, thine hand מֵאָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> me-'a-Chi-cha brother הָאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> ha-'ev-Yon. from thy poor

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for פָתֹ֧חַ <S%H6605><s%> fa-To-ach But thou shalt open תִּפְתַּ֛ח <S%H6605><s%> tif-Tach wide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha thine hand ל֑וֹ lo; וְהַעֲבֵט֙ <S%H5670><s%> ve-ha-'a-Vet unto him and shalt surely תַּעֲבִיטֶ֔נּוּ <S%H5670><s%> ta-'a-vi-Ten-nu, lend דֵּ֚י <S%H1767><s%> dei him sufficient מַחְסֹר֔וֹ <S%H4270><s%> mach-so-Ro, for his need אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whatever יֶחְסַ֖ר <S%H2637><s%> yech-Sar [in that] which he wanteth לֽוֹ׃ lo.

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> hish-Sha-mer Beware לְךָ֡ le-Cha פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- is no יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become דָבָר֩ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var that there be not a thought עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- in לְבָבְךָ֨ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha heart בְלִיַּ֜עַל <S%H1100><s%> ve-li-Ya-'al in thy wicked לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying קָֽרְבָ֣ה <S%H7126><s%> ka-re-Vah is at hand שְׁנַֽת־ <S%H8141><s%> she-nat- year הַשֶּׁבַע֮ <S%H7651><s%> hash-she-Va' The seventh שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> she-Nat the year הַשְּׁמִטָּה֒ <S%H8059><s%> hash-she-mit-Tah of release וְרָעָ֣ה <S%H7489><s%> ve-ra-'Ah be evil עֵֽינְךָ֗ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-ne-Cha, and thine eye בְּאָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> be-'a-Chi-cha brother הָֽאֶבְי֔וֹן <S%H34><s%> ha-'ev-Yon, against thy poor וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nothing תִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten and thou givest ל֑וֹ lo; וְקָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> ve-ka-Ra him nought and he cry עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha against אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah] become בְךָ֖ ve-Cha חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> Chet.] against thee and it be sin

נָת֤וֹן <S%H5414><s%> na-Ton Thou shalt surely תִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten give ל֔וֹ lo, וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יֵרַ֥ע <S%H7489><s%> ye-Ra' shall not be grieved לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha him and thine heart בְּתִתְּךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> be-tit-te-Cha when thou givest ל֑וֹ lo; כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בִּגְלַ֣ל׀ <S%H1558><s%> big-Lal unto him because הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var that for this thing הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-rech-Cha shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all מַעֲשֶׂ֔ךָ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Se-cha, thee in all thy works וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all מִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H4916><s%> mish-Lach and in all that thou puttest יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha. thine hand

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will never יֶחְדַּ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> yech-Dal shall never cease אֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> ev-Yon For the poor מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> mik-Ke-rev out of הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha therefore I command לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, thee saying פָּ֠תֹחַ <S%H6605><s%> Pa-to-ach Thou shalt open תִּפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> tif-Tach wide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדְךָ֜ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha thine hand לְאָחִ֧יךָ <S%H251><s%> le-'a-Chi-cha unto thy brother לַעֲנִיֶּ֛ךָ <S%H6041><s%> la-'a-ni-Ye-cha to thy poor וּלְאֶבְיֹנְךָ֖ <S%H34><s%> u-le-'ev-yo-ne-Cha and to thy needy בְּאַרְצֶֽךָ׃ <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-Tze-cha. in thy land ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִמָּכֵ֨ר <S%H4376><s%> yim-ma-Cher be sold לְךָ֜ le-Cha אָחִ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha [And] if thy brother הָֽעִבְרִ֗י <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Ri, an Hebrew man א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or הָֽעִבְרִיָּ֔ה <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-ri-Yah, or an Hebrew woman וַעֲבָֽדְךָ֖ <S%H5647><s%> va-'a-va-de-Cha unto thee and serve שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh thee six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim; years וּבַשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> u-vash-sha-Nah year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ת <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'It, then in the seventh תְּשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-le-Chen-nu thou shalt let him go חָפְשִׁ֖י <S%H2670><s%> cha-fe-Shi free מֵעִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> me-'im-Mach. with

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- When תְשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-le-Chen-nu And when thou sendest חָפְשִׁ֖י <S%H2670><s%> cha-fe-Shi him out free מֵֽעִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> me-'im-Mach; with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תְשַׁלְּחֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-le-Chen-nu from thee thou shalt not let him go away רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> rei-Kam. empty

הַעֲנֵ֤יק <S%H6059><s%> ha-'a-Neik Thou shalt furnish תַּעֲנִיק֙ <S%H6059><s%> ta-'a-Nik him liberally ל֔וֹ lo, מִצֹּ֣אנְךָ֔ <S%H6629><s%> mitz-Tzo-ne-cha, out of thy flock וּמִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ <S%H1637><s%> u-mig-ga-re-ne-Cha and out of thy floor וּמִיִּקְבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3342><s%> u-mi-yik-Ve-cha; and out of thy winepress אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after בֵּרַכְךָ֛ <S%H1288><s%> be-rach-Cha hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [of that] wherewith the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> tit-ten- thee thou shalt give לֽוֹ׃ lo.
